title: Enhancements
content:
Trait NameEffect Description
BalancedReroll 1s to Hit.
- Evenly weighted and finely tuned—less likely to falter under pressure.
HonedReroll 1 failed Hit roll.
- Sharpened edge or seamless plating makes precision more likely.
TemperedReroll 1s on Damage Rolls.
- Forged to endure—hits land harder, and resistance is more resilient.
SavageReroll 1 failed Damage Roll.
- Raw and brutal—hits strike deep, and endurance digs in.
BlessedReroll 1 failed Hit on Critical Hit.
- Responsive design that turns moments of clarity into lasting advantage.
HolyReroll all failed Hits on Critical Hit.
- Built for redemption—when all else fails, it steadies the hand.
